resources.string: The objective of the game is to survive. The longer you\'re alive, the harder the game gets.\n
To control and move your character, use the joystick.
You have 3 lives. You lose lives when the center of your character hits an enemy.\n

Power-Ups are the rainbow squares which spawn periodically and grant a random power-up. 
There are three types of power-ups:

 Freeze: Makes you invulnerable and freezes all enemies for a short period of time.
 Nuke: Eliminates all enemies on the game screen.
 Extra Life: Grants an additional life.
